posts.post_content:
I really appreciate the fact that there is a ![1000000](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1000000&type=symbol) icon in the Gatherer markup exclusively for this card. Thanks to [Mox Lotus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mox Lotus), there's also a ![100](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=100&type=symbol) icon, and presumably one for infinity mana as well, but I haven't been able to find it yet.  
  
As for the card, it's a perfect example of *Unhinged* hilarity. I can only imagine the insanity that would arise from playing a game when one hit the field.
posts.html:
